title: Keyboard Warrior’s Overlord Husband - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Timid Protagonist   Wealthy Characters
author: 月渐寒
description:
Su Mingyue in real life: Cowardly. When being bullied, she will cry a lot.

Su Mingyue in the online world: A chivalrous woman who cares for her country. Give her a keyboard and she can destroy the whole planet. Scums can’t keep up with the speed of her hands! You’re all unworthy, you’ll be destroyed by me!

Su Mingyue commenting under the National Husband’s Weibo: I would be the first snowflake in the avalanche, the howling on the hail, and the huge wave in a tsunami. Go, die!

As a keyboard warrior with explosive combat effectiveness, Su Mingyue’s life was plain and wonderful. 

Until one day, she received a lawyer’s warning letter. She didn’t take it seriously.

She then became a defendant on the court.

On the eve of the trial, Su Mingyue trembled in fear in front of the Demon Overlord, Gu Qinfeng. 

The man stared at her. His eyes were dark and his voice hoarse: 【Come on, tell all the oaths you made on the internet before and say it all in front of me!】>
